title: Enchanting Emerald & Pearl Bridal Haaram - Traditional South Indian Grandeur
materials: Natural South Sea Pearls (Moti - 55.15 carats). Expertly crafted with Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: A breathtaking bridal Haaram showcasing intricate filigree work and delicate diamond settings. The centerpiece features a large, vibrant Zambian Emerald surrounded by dazzling diamonds. Rows of cascading South Sea Pearls add a touch of classic elegance. The design incorporates traditional South Indian motifs, blending heritage with modern sophistication.
occasions: Perfect for grand celebrations like weddings (Vivaha Mahotsavam)
and milestone birthdays. A statement piece for any formal occasion.
description: This Haaram is a true heirloom piece, handcrafted with exceptional skill and attention to detail. The combination of Zambian Emeralds and South Sea Pearls symbolizes prosperity and good fortune. Its timeless design ensures it will be cherished for generations, making it a valuable investment and a meaningful addition to any jewelry collection.
